Pre-Game Insights: Unlucky South African team will be facing Bangladesh in the 22nd match of T20 World Cup on Thursday, October 27 at Sydney Cricket Ground.
South Africa played their first game against Zimbabwe in which they were in a comfortable position to snatch the match but rain played a spoiler and the match went to no result in the end.
Bangladesh won their first match of Super 12 stage against Netherlands where their bowling did a quite predictable work.
There is no update on any player getting injured. Both teams likely
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh and South Africa match will be get broadcasted on the Star Sports network on TV, and Hotstar for Indian viewers.
